message: I've never really considered myself a gamer, but I'll play. :) I'm Jina. I like card games, wii, rock band, scrabbble, dice games, etc. I am HORRIBLE at first person shooter style games. And I agree with Keith. This box is making me claustrophobic.
Anyway, figured we could get a running convo going about what games we play, etc.
I still vote using iChat instead. ;-)
Haha... I don't know. If so, that's pretty funny.  I just couldn't handle not having a message in here. :)
They should work on their blank slate, I was sooo confused when I got here.

I'll start.  I'm Keith. I'm into board games, war games, card games, video games and roleplaying games. Also into basketball.  Been playing in a weekly D&D game until recently and working on getting some game nights together, holler if you're interested. Also, if you're into Basketball, I'd like to play much more often than I do now.
(Side note, this text entry field is making me feel very, very cramped.)
Is it just the three of us?
I like card games, board games, video games, actual sports though I have bad knees & bad lungs from growing way too fast when I was 12–15, and that's about it.
Michael's around here as well, if not online right now
whee
hrm. got an error when I tried to invite others.

Hi I'm Faruk, I invited everyone to this group so far and I've no idea if other members can invite others into it, but I really hope so because I seriously don't want to be the sole gatekeeper, no way. :D

I was planning on making Monday night a weekly games night when I got back, with Munchkin but also whatever else people are up for. No need for that to wait for me if you guys have a host / place  for it :)
I have a good set of poker chips already.
I can't wait to be back in SF :/
Poker! Yes, definitely need to get a good set of poker chips to play games with.
Unless someone already has that…?
Howdy. I'm Kristin. I'm currently addicted to the new LBP... so f'n good. Collaborative without loosing all competitive play that typically illicites hysterical laughter & the occasional snort.
Oh, Little Big Planet 2?
LBP?
@dutchashell I have kind of special, happy memories to LBP 1. I take it you'd recommend LBP2 if it's "so f'n good" then?
